content.label: This game uses “old school” as an excuse for being poorly executed.  Back in the day, at least games came with a thick manual.  Not worth the money due to terrible, non-intuitive controls.

Death Road to Canada is a masterpiece. It is one of the most enjoyable uses of the Oregon Trail style text based strategy game model, with each level utilising a challenging and exciting top down action oriented zombie fighting experience. Outstandingly smooth to control even on my iPhone 6s Plus too! The art style, music, and comical writing all blend together to create a very memorable journey, and different randomised character interactions as well as achievements give a lot of replay value for $14.99.
If you're considering picking this game up, don't hesitate just download it and have fun!

This is a very underrated game, and it has an amazing amount of effort put into it. However, I do have some suggestions for the game. The first suggestion would be a minor change to the bow. The piercing chance should be buffed, while the non- charged bow shot should be slightly weaker, to balance it. The second suggestion would be to have online multiplayer between friends on steam, game center, etc. The third suggestion would be to have fitness or strength increase a point every 200 zombies destroyed. The fourth would be to buff martial arts to deal slightly more knock-back and have more range. The fifth would be a new trait that resembles a careless, loyal and innocent character. The upsides would be something along the lines of having good attitude and loyalty. The downsides would be wits, strength, and fitness. This trait would either be similar to oblivious or it would replace it. This is all up to you, of course. I know this game doesn’t update anymore, but if you do see this, please don’t feel compelled to make these changes. These are just things that I feel would improve the game.

title.label: Great game Hugh problem with endless mode crashing

content.label: it's super addicting crazy fun game, but unfortunately my friend and I are experiencing the same problem. In the endless mode, the game will crash after each loot location, so basically if we want to move on, we have move in and move out without looting anything which is impossible to survive the endless mode. Please fix this!!!

I love this game, but you should add something that allows you to custom pixelate your characters accessories. Such as making a custom hat (I like the hats but there could be more) where you have a certain area of length and width for maximum hat size, custom shirts/hoodies, custom pants with shoes, custom faces or whole characters. I just think it would be a great add on to the game.

I didn’t have the game but then I played it on my brother’s iPad then I’m like OMG ITS AMAZING I looked at it it costed like $5 then $15 I don’t blame anyone it amazing so I bought it and I loved it every day I played it EVERY SINGLE DAY that’s how much I love it u should buy it too.

title.label: Just want to report a weird bug

content.label: I had just finished a siege and was about to leave but when I tried to move out from the side the game wouldn’t let me even though nothing was in the way. I ended up losing 2 of my characters and most of my weapons because of it.

title.label: The Greatest Game Ever, But one CRIPPLING BUG

content.label:
Love this game, play it everyday. But I’ve been finding that it keeps crashing after each looting stop several times, and it’s PAINFUL!!! I’m playing endless mode, got the dream team, and a massive stash of loot and on my 104th day, but the game WONT LET ME PROGRESS!!! PLEASE, FIX THIS!!! I’ve even tried offloading the app, but it doesn’t work. The only way I can progress is by not looting, but this will slowly kill me. Once again, PLEASE FIX!!!

Edit: I think I figured out what the problem is. There are simply too many zombies for this game to load at these higher stages of endless, with impossible being a usual quantity and completely solid not being so rare. Still, Please Fix this!

title.label: By far my favorite mobile game

content.label: It’s funny, entertaining and endlessly replayable

This game is the best zombie game that I played! But I also have ideas to spice up the game. 1 Custom event, this is a Custom event that the player can make! (Ex: While searching a house Joe finds.... ) 2 A game mode called Rare events. Every time you go to loot there will be a Rare event. 3 a new trait called NEEEEEEEERD this makes the character Extremely smart. But makes you look like an idiot. These are my ideas for the game I hope they get added!
Had loads of fun with this game, humor, action, memes, pop culture references and so much more!

title.label: The BEST Game Ever On App Store

content.label: This game is amazing! The amount of hours I’ve put into my daring attempts to reach Canada has been so fun. I’ve never thought a mobile game could be this fun!! What I think it need is the ability to apply different game modes to one game save for wacky and interesting ways to play. Like having Hard difficulty with familiar characters, rare or super rare characters applied so you can have a challenge with on a unpredictable road trip to Canada. Maybe hard mode with the shorter trip or longer trip mode on with that to change things up a bit! These are just small things I’d like to see. I absolutely love playing this game and will continue to play. Definitely worth the price!!

Love this game and wish the Paladins expansion came to iOS (heck, even the description says it was coming in 2017). But more than anything, PLEASE add support for iPhone X and other newer phone models.

I actually like this game more than Death Road to Canada and would prefer you update this over that game. This is an iOS classic!
I love this game and I have played it non-stop since I got it, the only things that I would highly recommend is an actual multiplayer mode (Online and Local)

title.label: My Favorite Game to Play on the Road

content.label:
This game maybe be behind a $15 gate, but it’s worth every penny. It starts off slow to keep your expectations healthily low, and much later after playing, it starts to get DnD-like text events with dungeon crawler gameplay.

Some issues I want to point out:

- The weapon priorities should get a check up, because my all powerful wizard isn’t using his all powerful wizzle stick because a kitchen knife is apparently better.

The AI seems to rank the weapon itself versus what it actually does.

Also the Doc reeeeaally doesn’t like using her laser gun... she also keeps droping her Calvary Saber for a pistol. Kind of annoying and I have to be paranoid that someone’s suddenly going to drop something really good for something mediocre.

That’s it really.

Aside from that, a Master Piece of a game.
I don’t understand some of these reviews, unless their fake. For the price of this game... I don’t see the value being there. It’s not that great honestly. I wouldn’t recommend...
I love this game and it keeps my interest up but I don’t have MFI controllers to play with my friends so please make it so you can do multiplayer across multiple devices
One of the funniest, most addictive games I’ve ever played. 15 bucks is steep but from everything I have experienced in a week, I would say totally worth it.

I have this game on both my computer & my phone. 

I've put in quite a few hours & had so many exciting moments, experiences, & encounters in this game, yet I feel like I haven't even seen them all. 

5/5 would definitely recommend!

title.label: It was good but endless mode makes the game unplayable.

content.label: The game is great until you play endless mode. About 45 days into it the game crashes after the level no matter what option is picked. It makes endless mode unplayable.
Upon reinstall, all perk upgrades and stats deleted.
I love the custom players but please add head shape and face different.  Also make us be able to get a Custom dog

title.label: Good game but the controls are a bit iffy

content.label: And by controllers I mean the movement controls, it feels very unnatural and you should have an option of using a more pad like control system. The sliding control is just too weird

Seriously, this game is great. My only complaint is that I’ve been asking for horse masks to be added as a custom hat from the beginning of the game’s development on Twitter (still hasn’t happened). Cool game tho (rewriting old review).

Before I start: I really love this game. This review isn't to turn potential buyers away, because I strongly recommend this game to anyone that favors retro games or liked Oregon Trail. It has very unique graphics that are not common in this day and age, amazing replayability, and quirky, charming humor that's very lovable. I've finished most of the game modes and I've been cycling through Endless mode for a while; however, I have ironically played the game TOO much that I'm on day 251 and I can't finish any ABL's without the game crashing as soon as I tap "yes" to leave the location. I don't know if it's because there's too many zombies for my phone to handle or what, but if you can, please fix this. I'm not sure if this is useful, but I'm on an iPhone 6s+, 64GB with 38GB remaining, iOS 12.1.2.

Love it. Highly replayable and totally addictive. But it is a GRIND. And it is HARD. Nothing easy about getting close to Canada, let alone TO it. Fortunately the journey is the fun, most of the time (when you get on a run of bad luck it can be a real drag). And there’s enough occasional new stuff sprinkled throughout. Ultimately I love it, but it’s exhausting and I wish it were on AppleTV. It seems perfect for it.
This game is great, I especially love the ability to tell people to COOL IT!!!
Crashes almost always and usually happens with a full party.

title.label: Not worth the price of admission

content.label: Is it fun? I’m sure some people really like it. Personally I was branching out and looking for that next game that would give me hours, days and months of solid enjoyment. Sadly this was not that game for me. If you’re gonna charge fifteen human dollars; then I expected something absolutely stunning and beyond reproach. This is mediocre.  Characters move slowly and clumsily. There’s nothing smooth about the controls. Sigh, And now I’m out 15 bones.

title.label: I've been playing for over a year and have yet to get tired of this game.

content.label: In this 20th year of my life, it feels like everything is changing. From my friend groups to my career aspirations to relationship with my family, everything is changing. Usually for the better, but sometimes for the worse. In the midst of a this change, one thing has remained constant: my love for DR2C. This goofy, creative, and brutally difficult zombie-themed road trip simulator has been, and will probably continue to be, my go-to time killer. Despite my 313 playthroughs (7 wins, 306 losses), the random generation of each encounter keeps things fresh, and the frequent updates continue to add new content. This game has truly infinite replay value. It is easily the best game on iOS, and better than most console games to boot. At $8, DR2C is worth every penny. See you in Canada.

So first off I have no quarrels with this game, on the contraire! I’ve been playing this game for about 2 years now. Since then I’ve found and awful exploit. Don’t read on if you don’t want to know about it.

Cheaters, developers, we all here? Ok so when an unfavorable put come happens i.e someone dying you force close the app. This just takes some challenge from the game. Correct me if I’m wrong, but I think it happens because of how the game saves, it doesn’t save when exploring so, if you rest the game mid scavenge run it won’t actually keep the out come. Anyways please fix this somehow (maybe) if now I’ll just have to keep exercising self-control. P.s the game was worth $15

I really was looking forward to the multiplayer for along time, but I didn’t realize what I was waiting for. I thought it would be a 2 device type multiplayer where you and a friend could play on separate devices without controllers. I think you developers should really look into make this a thing.

It’s as if the Oregon trail went horribly wrong.  The central premise is that your party is fleeing a zombie horde (rage virus zombie) from Florida to Canada.  It features a wide array of challenges and overall is brilliantly executed. 

This game is incredibly deep with multiple game modes.  I bought this at release and they keep creating new content.  This is one of the best purchases I have made in the store as far as how much it rewards replays.
I have a favor to ask, can you add more character boxes, and can you add a way to start with an animal, or have a way to customize a dog to start with
Good day, This game is amazing it’s just the newest update had opp mode which doesn’t work. When I chose that mode it freezes up and kicks me out. Please fix

title.label: Omg the latest update is so lit 🔥

content.label:
Seriously read the update log and tell me that is not awesome... Overall this game will always be fun, plus it works without internet. Also if you this review is a bit, haters gonna hate lol 😂 

Also this game has a lot of replay value especially with the new update with endless mode!

I have this game long time ago , not that long but quite long time 😂😅, its a very fun game , I love the way that the game looks the playability the gestures and everything, this game is incredible , and more fun the type of weapons and challenges that this amazing game has!!!!! Oh and the RARE characters 🤩🤩🤩, I already make it to Canada 2 times!!! 1 with my Principal character and the other one with my new character! This is epic , and soon I will be buying this incredible game on my Xbox , and maybe on PC too🤔🤔, amazing game!!!!!

I love this game I play it so much it’s just that my friend on Android gets updates almost like 2 weeks before I do and he is on android so please make the updates for Apple sooner other than that I love the game

I apologize for the bad review, but I figured this way, it’s easier for you to notice my complaint, since most of the feedback is overwhelmingly positive. I love the idea, but could you please add a joystick or something to make movement easier? It’s ridiculous how annoying and slippery the current way to move is, and I’ve died multiple times just from running out of screen room to slide my thumb on. I also think making a seperate button just for attacking would be good, although I don’t as much about that as the movement thing.
Better controls please. A d-pad would be lovely. I don’t feel as though I have complete control over my character

I was fickle on deciding to buy this game or not, it took me about a day to decide to go get an App Store gift card and see what all the hubbub was about. Welp, I saw: since opening the app, it has been ALL I’ve done at work ( calling on computers.. we’re encouraged to be on our phones playing with apps, for a few reasons) , and it has also made time zip by, which is semi-precious for an app to keep me entertained that much. Furthermore, I haven’t even made it past the first round of massive hoarding, there’s already soooo much replay value for me, I can keep on going- I don’t tire after a few times of being beat down by the crowds.  For what your money is worth, I’m going to say that this game is worth the 14 bucks. It’s like 14 dollars worth of paid games wrapped into one, it’s totally worth it. Really a fine game for an iPhone ..... five out of five-  

      Todd J
Love the game, keep up the good work on future endeavors guys :)

Overall, I love this game. With fast-paced action and humor Death Road to Canada is the perfect game for me. It gets hard at times (I actually haven’t beat it) but it’s still really great! There’s one thing that could make it even better: Local multiplayer. There would be a few problems with that but it would still make it even more fun. Thanks for creating such a great game!

title.label: I’m not sure if the author reads these....

content.label: But anyway this game is SO GREAT!!! There is time that I’ll quit playing it for a while, but then I come right back to it. There’s just a few ideas that I thought you should do. It would be awesome is once you got to Canada, you got a house there and you could customize it and all of the people that you’ve gotten to Canada will be in there. I just thought of that and thought Wow that would be freaking awesome!
This game truly lives up to its value!!! You will spend TONS of HOURS playing this wonderful game! I highly suggest you support RocketCat games and try this game out!!! ✌️😄👍

title.label: Meh. Much ado, didn't do much for me.

content.label: Don't really enjoy the main fighting game mechanic. It's just not that fun to kill sombies in this game. I saw basically no progress over many attempts to learn and enjoy the game. My characters never progressed. Playing wasn't fun. The so called humor everyone raves about... i guess the bar is pretty low for video game and app humor. Not worth what i overpaid bevause the game is overrated and overhyped. They did do a good job on the visual style.  Would have been fun to explore if the rest of the game wasn't such a drag.

This game has multiple modes, unlimited rando character builds, and most importantly, it’s the definition of “easy to play, hard to master”.

Worth EVERY DOLLAR.

I would first off like to say I love and enjoy this game however, I got a new phone and was sad to see all my progress was gone after I had grinded out all of the things you could get with zombo points, and all of my created characters, If there is anyway to get an old account back I would be delighted if you could help me.

title.label: A good time taking game also rage enthusing

content.label: Title and rating explain my liking of this game buy and beat it and I’ll think you are a god
